pkgsearch 2.0.1.9000

Metadata about a CRAN package

Source: R/crandb-public-api.R
cran_package.Rd

Metadata about a CRAN package

cran_package(name, version = NULL)

Arguments

name

Name of the package.
version

The package version to query. If NULL, the latest version if returned.

Value

The package metadata, in a named list.

Examples

# \dontrun{
cran_package("pkgsearch")
#> $Package
#> [1] "pkgsearch"
#> 
#> $Title
#> [1] "Search CRAN R Packages"
#> 
#> $Version
#> [1] "2.0.1"
#> 
#> $`Authors@R`
#> [1] "c(person(\"Gábor\", \"Csárdi\", email = \"csardi.gabor@gmail.com\",\nrole = c(\"aut\", \"cre\")))"
#> 
#> $Description
#> [1] "Search CRAN R packages. Uses the 'METACRAN' search server,\nsee <https://r-pkg.org>."
#> 
#> $License
#> [1] "MIT + file LICENSE"
#> 
#> $LazyData
#> [1] "true"
#> 
#> $URL
#> [1] "https://github.com/metacran/pkgsearch#readme"
#> 
#> $BugReports
#> [1] "https://github.com/metacran/pkgsearch/issues"
#> 
#> $Imports
#> $Imports$magrittr
#> [1] "*"
#> 
#> $Imports$httr
#> [1] "*"
#> 
#> $Imports$jsonlite
#> [1] "*"
#> 
#> $Imports$parsedate
#> [1] "*"
#> 
#> $Imports$prettyunits
#> [1] "*"
#> 
#> 
#> $Suggests
#> $Suggests$covr
#> [1] "*"
#> 
#> $Suggests$testthat
#> [1] "*"
#> 
#> $Suggests$tibble
#> [1] "*"
#> 
#> 
#> $Encoding
#> [1] "UTF-8"
#> 
#> $RoxygenNote
#> [1] "6.1.0"
#> 
#> $NeedsCompilation
#> [1] "no"
#> 
#> $Packaged
#> [1] "2018-12-04 22:38:55 UTC; gaborcsardi"
#> 
#> $Author
#> [1] "Gábor Csárdi [aut, cre]"
#> 
#> $Maintainer
#> [1] "Gábor Csárdi <csardi.gabor@gmail.com>"
#> 
#> $Repository
#> [1] "CRAN"
#> 
#> $`Date/Publication`
#> [1] "2018-12-05 06:50:03 UTC"
#> 
#> $crandb_file_date
#> [1] "2018-12-05 06:56:28"
#> 
#> $MD5sum
#> [1] "25c874565c70866576b8e2228980af7c"
#> 
#> $date
#> [1] "2018-12-05T05:50:03+00:00"
#> 
#> $releases
#> list()
#> 
#> attr(,"class")
#> [1] "cran_package"
# }
